name: Emoji Generator
description:
Inspired by https://twitter.com/_seiishin/status/1153333849130246146  I thought maybe people could do with a generator if they don't feel like picking their own emoji, or get decision paralysis.

A few emoji have been removed (notably: all the country flags) because they didn't work well in browser.

If you want to generate more, you can generate up to 1000 by typing in the number you want to generate on the page linked at the bottom.
